structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Removal of injurious substance from highway.
law.text: Any person removing a wrecked or damaged vehicle from a highway shall remove any glass or other injurious substance dropped upon the highway from such vehicle.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980.
